item.description:
TO OPEN A SEASON ON A HARBOR, MEET, CHAT, PLAN SUMMER EVENTS. DEPENDING ON HOW MANY PEOPLE WILL SIGN, WE COULD MEET EITHER AT MY PLACE, OR MEETING ROOM OF A CONDO COMPLEX. SUMMER IN MARBLEHEAD IS VERY LOVELY AND CHARMING. WILL UPDATE WITH ADDRESS SHORTLY. CENTER OF HISTORICAL DOWNTOWN, BY THE WATER.

WE CAN GO TO THE LANDING AND ENJOY THE EVENING ON THE DECK, THEN TAKE A WALK AROUND OLD TOWN. AND THEN HAVE A CUP OF TEA, OR COFFE AT MY OLD PLACE (DOWNTOWN HISTORICAL HOUSE) BY THE FIRE, IF ITS CHILLY!
WE'LL HAVE A MEETUP ROOM ON JUNE 20TH.
item.how_to_find_us: in front of the Landing, on the dock.

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: SUMMER SEASON
